This statement is false. Pipeline reports cannot be overridden. The pipeline is a snapshot of opportunities at a particular point in time, and cannot be changed once it has been generated. On the other hand, forecasts can be overridden by managers or other users with appropriate permissions, to adjust the expected revenue or close dates for opportunities.

Recent Item and Look up Hover Views use the:
A. Sidebar
B. Edit Page
C. List Views
D. Related Lists

The Recent Item and Look up Hover Views typically use the D. Related Lists in Salesforce.

Related Lists are displayed on a record's detail page, and they show a list of records that are related to the current record. Recent Item and Look up Hover Views both display related records to provide users with a quick way to view information related to the record they are currently viewing without leaving the page.

Recent Item displays a list of records recently viewed by the user for a specific object, while Look up Hover displays a list of records that match the search term entered in the lookup field. Both views are designed to help users navigate and find related records efficiently.

A. True, searches and filters that take a long time may be cancelled in Salesforce.

Salesforce provides a feature called "Search Timeout" to cancel long-running searches and filters to prevent overloading the system resources. When a user performs a search or filter, Salesforce sets a time limit on the operation. If the search or filter operation takes longer than the time limit, Salesforce cancels the operation and displays a message to the user indicating that the search or filter could not be completed.

The search timeout limit can be customized by Salesforce administrators to balance system performance and user experience. The default search timeout limit in Salesforce is 120 seconds, but it can be increased or decreased depending on the organization's needs
